value:
Our parents died when Shanna and
Thea were still young. To them, I'm
more of a mother than an older sister.

I have a trusted friend looking after
my daughter. She's safe there while
Zelot and I win peace for Askr.

Shanna teases me that Zelot and I are
going to fall in love all over again at
this festival. Oh, how right she is!

I wonder if this outfit might be too
grand. Then again, the occasion
most certainly warrants it!

If I want my sisters to be able to start
families of their own, we must first
secure a lasting peace.

Are you here for the bridal festival?
My name is Juno. I hail from
$Nf's castle.

May the happiness of brides past,
present, and future last forevermore.

I'm surprised this beautiful dress is
still clean after that! Well then, shall
we head to the festival proper?
Has my edge dulled so quickly?

You are so very thoughtful. I will
remember this day for a long
time to come.

I'm Juno, former member of the
Pegasus Knights of Ilia.$k$pIt's been quite a while since my own
wedding, but I'll be happy to help
with the festival in any way I can.

Seeing an Askran wedding brings
back so many memories of Zelot's
and my own ceremony...$k$pMy sisters worked so hard to make
everything special and beautiful.$k$pAnd just wearing this outfit makes my
heart overflow with giddy nostalgia.
What a day that was!$k$pIt's no wonder everyone's so eager to
be a part of this festival. Weddings
are about joy and laughter and hope.$k$pIt's more than just the union of a
pair of lovebirds or their families.
It's about new beginnings!$k$pIt's so wonderful! But how about
you? Is there a special someone in
your life, $Nu?
はいっ
いきます
きゃあっ
いけません…
A happy day.
For the one I love!
Let us join our strength!
I, too, believe...
My dear, I am sorry...
Hehe...
I am Juno. Zelot is my husband. I want to thank you for inviting us to this lovely festival.
Ah! Oh, it's you. Is Zelot looking for me?
Once again, I am dressed as a bride, and it makes me just as happy as it did the first time.
I wonder if my younger sisters will ever marry. Oh, I do hope so.
Oh, this dress… I'm eager to see Zelot's reaction.
I hope that the day comes when we three can live together peacefully.
I am so happy that you were able to share this joyous day with us.
I see...
Oh!
I am with you.
